post.title: blogging using the nokia lumia 1520
post.content:
i am writing this post using my lumia 1520. while this probably isn't the intended use case, it's good to know that if i just wanted to do a brain dump of more than 140 chars, it's possible.

 

instead of the split screen

instead of the split screen that appears on the desktop, the mobile view in ghost is tabbed, so the markdown editor appears on one tab and the live preview appears on another.

 

 

finishing on the laptopi'm finishing out this post on the laptop. the mobile editor is convenient, but the on-screen keyboard and the scrolling seemed to fight for screen real estate. as a result, it was difficult to position the cursor at the last line of text in order to continue writing. but, if you are able to keep your posts to within two paragraphs, you will be fine.
